citeinfo.origin: U.S. Department of the Interior, Bureau of Land Management (BLM)
U.S. Department of Interior, Bureau of Land Management (BLM)
citeinfo.title: F_SampledReaches_W_B

descript.abstract: Wadeable and boatable reach information such as PointID, date visited, individuals involved in data collection, protocol used, and bottom and top of reach latitude and longitude. Additional reach characteristics such as beaver modifications or waterwithdrawls are included. Much of this information is included in the I_Indicator table but this table has some additional information.
descript.purpose: Wadeable and boatable reach information such as PointID, date visited, individuals involved in data collection, protocol used, and bottom and top of reach latitude and longitude. Additional reach characteristics such as beaver modifications or waterwithdrawls are included. Much of this information is included in the I_Indicator table but this table has some additional information.

idinfo.accconst: None, these data are considered public domain.
idinfo.useconst: These data are provided by Bureau of Land Management (BLM) "as is" and might contain errors or omissions. The User assumes the entire risk associated with its use of these data and bears all responsibility in determining whether these data are fit for the User's intended use. The information contained in these data is dynamic and may change over time. The data are not better than the sources from which they were derived, and both scale and accuracy may vary across the data set. These data might not have the accuracy, resolution, completeness, timeliness, or other characteristics appropriate for applications that potential users of the data may contemplate. The User is encouraged to carefully consider the content of the metadata file associated with these data. These data are neither legal documents nor land surveys, and must not be used as such. Official records may be referenced at most BLM offices. Please report any errors in the data to the BLM office from which it was obtained. The BLM should be cited as the data source in any products derived from these data. Any Users wishing to modify the data should describe the types of modifications they have performed. The User should not misrepresent the data, nor imply that changes made were approved or endorsed by BLM. This data may be updated by the BLM without notification.

cntaddr.address: BLM National Operations Center; Denver Federal Center,Building 50

idinfo.datacred: US Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management Assessment, Inventory, and Monitoring Project Team; NAMC

attracc.attraccr: Contact contributor of specific features for accuracy information

dataqual.logic: Data are related to the I_Indicators layer based upon the EvaluationID.
dataqual.complete: Contact contributor of specific features for accuracy information

horizpa.horizpar: Contact contributor of specific features for accuracy information

procstep.procdesc: Data were collected by trained field crews with the BLM and partner organizations. They followed the BLM core aquatic core and contingent indicators in TR 1735-2 (AIM National Aquatic Monitoring Framework: Field Protocol for Wadeable Lotic System). Pre-2021 data were captured electronically using the Stream And River Assessment Hub (SARAH), and 2021 and later data were collected using Survey123. They were managed by the data collectors, with oversight from BLM field offices, state offices, and the National Operations Center. This dataset has undergone rigorous QA/QC to ensure data quality.

cntaddr.address: BLM National Operations Center; Denver Federal Center,Building 50

enttyp.enttypd: Wadeable and boatable reach information such as PointID, date visited, individuals involved in data collection, protocol used, and bottom and top of reach latitude and longitude. Additional reach characteristics such as beaver modifications or waterwithdrawls are included. Much of this information is included in the I_Indicator table but this table has some additional information.

attr.attrdef: Internal feature number.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Feature geometry.

attrdomv.udom: Coordinates defining the features.

attr.attrdef: Unique visit or evaluation identifier; PointID concatenated with the evaluation/ sampled date

attrdomv.udom: Unique visit or evaluation identifier; PointID concatenated with the evaluation/ sampled date

attr.attrdef: Unique location identifier; 2-3 letter prefix indicating the original stratum, followed by the stream order group, and 4-5 digit random code specifying the order the points were selected

attrdomv.udom: Unique location identifier; 2-3 letter prefix indicating the original stratum, followed by the stream order group, and 4-5 digit random code specifying the order the points were selected

attr.attrdef: Date the point or reach was evaluated to determine if it could be sampled or not

attrdomv.udom: Date the point or reach was evaluated to determine if it could be sampled or not

attr.attrdef: Protocol implemented (wadeable vs. boatable).

attrdomv.udom: Protocol implemented (wadeable vs. boatable).

attr.attrdef: Pdf archive of the protocol used for data collection

attrdomv.udom: Pdf archive of the protocol used for data collection

attr.attrdef: This is a subset of FieldEvalStatus categories and is whether the reach was partially or fully sampled or had interrupted flow.

attrdomv.udom: This is a subset of FieldEvalStatus categories and is whether the reach was partially or fully sampled or had interrupted flow.

attr.attrdef: Where the mid reach point coordinates moved up or downstream from the original design coordinate to get more sampleable transects?

attrdomv.udom: Where the mid reach point coordinates moved up or downstream from the original design coordinate to get more sampleable transects?

attr.attrdef: Calculated straight-line distance (m) between the original GRTS design coordinate and the F transect coordinate; distance between sampled targeted points and original targeted point locations may not be calculated or may be misleading and reflect changes in targeted points to be sampled

attrdomv.udom: Calculated straight-line distance (m) between the original GRTS design coordinate and the F transect coordinate; distance between sampled targeted points and original targeted point locations may not be calculated or may be misleading and reflect changes in targeted points to be sampled

attr.attrdef: Latitude of the F transect of the sampled reach in decimal degrees and WGS84 datum

attrdomv.udom: Latitude of the F transect of the sampled reach in decimal degrees and WGS84 datum

attr.attrdef: The longitude of the F transect of the sampled reach in decimal degrees and WGS84 datum

attrdomv.udom: The longitude of the F transect of the sampled reach in decimal degrees and WGS84 datum

attr.attrdef: Accuracy of F transect coordinates (m)

attrdomv.udom: Accuracy of F transect coordinates (m)

attr.attrdef: Elevation (m) at Transect F

attrdomv.udom: Elevation (m) at Transect F

attr.attrdef: Latitude of top of reach in decimal degrees and WGS84 datum

attrdomv.udom: Latitude of top of reach in decimal degrees and WGS84 datum

attr.attrdef: Longitude of top of reach in decimal degrees and WGS84 datum

attrdomv.udom: Longitude of top of reach in decimal degrees and WGS84 datum

attr.attrdef: Accuracy of the top of the reach coordinates (m)

attrdomv.udom: Accuracy of the top of the reach coordinates (m)

attr.attrdef: Latitude of bottom of reach in decimal degrees and WGS84 datum

attrdomv.udom: Latitude of bottom of reach in decimal degrees and WGS84 datum

attr.attrdef: Longitude of bottom of reach in decimal degrees and WGS84 datum

attrdomv.udom: Longitude of bottom of reach in decimal degrees and WGS84 datum

attr.attrdef: Accuracy of the bottom of the reach coordinates (m)

attrdomv.udom: Accuracy of the bottom of the reach coordinates (m)

attr.attrdef: Latitude of the feature that monuments the F transect in decimal degrees and WGS84 datum

attrdomv.udom: Latitude of the feature that monuments the F transect in decimal degrees and WGS84 datum

attr.attrdef: Longitude of the feature that monuments the F transect in decimal degrees and WGS84 datum

attrdomv.udom: Longitude of the feature that monuments the F transect in decimal degrees and WGS84 datum

attr.attrdef: Accuracy of the coordinate of the monument feature for the F transect (m)

attrdomv.udom: Accuracy of the coordinate of the monument feature for the F transect (m)

attr.attrdef: Total reach length intended to be sampled. Calculated in the app from average widths using the protocol rules

attrdomv.udom: Total reach length intended to be sampled. Calculated in the app from average widths using the protocol rules

attr.attrdef: Average of 5 typical bankfull widths. This measurement is used to define reach length. Reach length is 20 times this measurement but has a minimum of 150 meters and a maximum of 4000 meters.

attrdomv.udom: Average of 5 typical bankfull widths. This measurement is used to define reach length. Reach length is 20 times this measurement but has a minimum of 150 meters and a maximum of 4000 meters.

attr.attrdef: Average of 5 typical wetted widths. This measurement is used to define reach length. Reach length is 40 times this measurement but has a minimum of 150 meters and a maximum of 4000 meters. Wadeable protocol was changed from this method to use AvgTypicalBankfullWidths instead but boatable still uses this method.

attrdomv.udom: Average of 5 typical wetted widths. This measurement is used to define reach length. Reach length is 40 times this measurement but has a minimum of 150 meters and a maximum of 4000 meters. Wadeable protocol was changed from this method to use AvgTypicalBankfullWidths instead but boatable still uses this method.

attr.attrdef: Distance between each thalweg depth measurement (m)

attrdomv.udom: Distance between each thalweg depth measurement (m)

attr.attrdef: Number of thalweg stations supposed to be collected between each main transect; number has varied among protocols but was initially based on avg typical widths with smaller streams having more measurements than larger streams

attrdomv.udom: Number of thalweg stations supposed to be collected between each main transect; number has varied among protocols but was initially based on avg typical widths with smaller streams having more measurements than larger streams

attr.attrdef: Flow influence by beaver across the reach. Options of Major, Minor or None

attrdomv.udom: Flow influence by beaver across the reach. Options of Major, Minor or None

attr.attrdef: Qualitative visual assessment of frequency of beaver signs (e.g. chewed logs) within the reach (Absent, Rare, Common)

attrdomv.udom: Qualitative visual assessment of frequency of beaver signs (e.g. chewed logs) within the reach (Absent, Rare, Common)

attr.attrdef: Presence or absence of water withdrawals

attrdomv.udom: Presence or absence of water withdrawals

attr.attrdef: Weather conditions while sampling the reach

attrdomv.udom: Weather conditions while sampling the reach

attr.attrdef: The BLM administrative unit associated with the design and points. WRSA points are associated with district or field office level projects if these points are reused at those specific levels in a design.

attrdomv.udom: The BLM administrative unit associated with the design and points. WRSA points are associated with district or field office level projects if these points are reused at those specific levels in a design.

attr.attrdef: Organization that the field crew leader personnel belongs to; If BLM project leads accompanied a crew at a site, the crew's organization was used rather than the project lead.

attrdomv.udom: Organization that the field crew leader personnel belongs to; If BLM project leads accompanied a crew at a site, the crew's organization was used rather than the project lead.

attr.attrdef: Name of crew leader

attrdomv.udom: Name of crew leader

attr.attrdef: Name of first additional crew member

attrdomv.udom: Name of first additional crew member

attr.attrdef: Name of second additional crew member

attrdomv.udom: Name of second additional crew member

attr.attrdef: Name of third additional crew member

attrdomv.udom: Name of third additional crew member

attr.attrdef: Names of any additional data collectors present during sampling that were not directly hired by the data collection organization initially or BLM project leads

attrdomv.udom: Names of any additional data collectors present during sampling that were not directly hired by the data collection organization initially or BLM project leads

attr.attrdef: Reaches resampled within 2-3 weeks by an independent crew to quantify protocol repeatability

attrdomv.udom: Reaches resampled within 2-3 weeks by an independent crew to quantify protocol repeatability

attr.attrdef: A unique identifier for each row in each table

attrdomv.udom: A unique identifier for each row in each table

attr.attrdef: Unique visit identifier from NAMC. Generated at time of data collection by the iPad.

attrdomv.udom: Unique visit identifier from NAMC. Generated at time of data collection by the iPad.

attr.attrdef: BLM administrative state

attrdomv.udom: BLM administrative state

attr.attrdef: URL linking the sampled reaches to a web enabled index page displaying related photos and photo comments. Only available to internal users.

attrdomv.udom: URL linking the sampled reaches to a web enabled index page displaying related photos and photo comments. Only available to internal users.

attr.attrdef: NHD catchments identifier (COMID) used to track whether points were moved from their original DesignCOMID.

attrdomv.udom: NHD catchments identifier (COMID) used to track whether points were moved from their original DesignCOMID.

attr.attrdef: Comments from the crew on how they accessed the reach or how it should be accessed in the future.

attrdomv.udom: Comments from the crew on how they accessed the reach or how it should be accessed in the future.

attr.attrdef: Name of the individual responsible for conducting office evaluations

attrdomv.udom: Name of the individual responsible for conducting office evaluations

attr.attrdef: Comments from the office evaluator detailing information such as how to access the reach, if it is likely to have water, ect.

attrdomv.udom: Comments from the office evaluator detailing information such as how to access the reach, if it is likely to have water, ect.

attr.attrdef: Date the point or reach was office evaluated to determine if it could be sampled or not

attrdomv.udom: Date the point or reach was office evaluated to determine if it could be sampled or not

attr.attrdef: Elevation (m) at the bottom of the reach. For fully sampled reaches, this will correspond to Transect A.

attrdomv.udom: Elevation (m) at the bottom of the reach. For fully sampled reaches, this will correspond to Transect A.

attr.attrdef: Elevation (m) at the top of the reach. For fully sampled reaches, this will correspond to Transect K.

attrdomv.udom: Elevation (m) at the top of the reach. For fully sampled reaches, this will correspond to Transect K.

attr.attrdef: Name of the user that created the data entry.

attrdomv.udom: Name of the user that created the data entry.

attr.attrdef: Date the data entry was created.

attrdomv.udom: Date the data entry was created.

attr.attrdef: Name of the user that last edited the data.

attrdomv.udom: Name of the user that last edited the data.

attr.attrdef: Date the data was last edited.

attrdomv.udom: Date the data was last edited.

overview.eaover: Entities are broad data types and attributes are specific AIM indicators collected at reaches across BLM lands for a variety of purposes.
